text.string: You and nine friends are spending the summer holidays at Crystal Lake Holiday Camp, miles away from civilisation, unaware that Jason Voorhees has a filthy grotto close to the camp. At midnight on the first day, while unpacking, you notice a bloodstained mask and with horror, you realise that
Terrified, you must protect your friends from the marauding Jason and finally dispose of him .....
Can you find and kill Jason before he can kill you?
